pullrequest.title: Added documentation for test coverage, and a section for internal developers.

content.raw: I'm not sure if it's very helpful to point new collaborators to the google style guide because it is quite long and there are divergences with our style. Just starting to read it I see they use `.h` for headers instead of `.hh`, for example. Variable names are also different, they explicitly say `thisIsBad`.
content.html: I'm not sure if it's very helpful to point new collaborators to the google style guide because it is quite long and there are divergences with our style. Just starting to read it I see they use .h for headers instead of .hh, for example. Variable names are also different, they explicitly say thisIsBad.
